tool_description: Free API to get latest Canada News within many categories from CBC World News
name: The Canadian - Canada News API
title: The Canadian - Canada News API

api_list.name: Get news by category
api_list.description: You can get slug query parameters from **/categories** endpoint's response
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-canadian-canada-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/politics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-canadian-canada-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-canadian-canada-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/{slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-canadian-canada-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get news categories
api_list.description:
Get all filter category names and slugs
The slug used in query "/news/{category slug]" endpoint

api_list.name: Get all news
api_list.description: Query homepage news including Canada local newses and all featured news articles.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-canadian-canada-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-canadian-canada-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
